service.subtitle: Services
service.text: With an individual approach, we can offer <2>innovative solutions</2> that were created with close cooperation, good communication of user requirements, use of the most modern technologies in development and a team that thinks outside the box, thinks the <2>digital way</2>.

testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials
testimonials.text: Through feedback from our users, we gain insight into the ways in which we can further improve our services and products and thus contribute to an even better user experience and simpler digitalization of business.
